Html:
Hi i was just wondering if I could use this sdk to integrate my client side web cam in my web application.

i would like to send back clicks from the camera and other information back to the server.

Thanks in advance,

Arsalan

yes you can.

in .NET you can do http posts ... ( see webclient or httpwebrequest on MSDN )
in a HTTP post you can send a file , or even send your image as a BASE64 variable with some other variables.

google: bitmap to byte array.
convert byte array it to base64 string. ﻿ (﻿﻿ Convert.ToBase64String(..) )

google: "site:msdn.microsoft.com  httpwebrequest  POST"

the data you shoud post : String PostDATA = String.Format( "myImage={0}&mysecondvariable={1}&mythridvar={2}" , base64string , "dummyvar1" , "dummyvar2");

in php: $Image = $_POST['myImage']; (decode it, and save it as an image )
in ASP:  String base64image = Request.form['myImage'] ;   // decode .. .etc

and your done.
